author: Source: The Globe and Mail
title: Alibaba offers to buy all of 'China's YouTube' - The Globe and Mail
text:
Alibaba Group Holding Ltd offered to buy all of the shares of Youku Tudou Inc that it does not already own in a deal that would value the Chinese video streaming company at about $5.2-billion . Alibaba already owns 18.3 per cent of Youku Tudou - sometimes nicknamed China's YouTube - having bought into the company in May 2014 as part of its push into online video.
Start the conversation, or Read more at The Globe and Mail.
